pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==================eqassertion==================assertions in `__eq__` methods.>>> from eqassertions import Any, NotNone, IsA, IsTrue, Match>>> data = {"a": 1, "b": 2}>>> assert {"a": 1, "b": Any()}>>> assert {"a": 1, "b": NotNone()}>>> assert {"a": 1, "b": IsA(int)}>>> assert {"a": 1, "b": IsTrue()}>>> assert v == {"a": 1, "b": Match(r"\d")}>>> assert v == {"a": 1, "b": Match(r"[a-z]")}Traceback (most recent call last): ...AssertionError
